titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to carry out a major medical facility project in Jacksonville, Florida.
Veterans Emergency Treatment Services Act
Veterans Emergency Treatment Services Act
VETS Act
VETS Act
VETS Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Veterans Emergency Treatment Services Act or the VETS Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to spend up to $300 million in FY2019 to construct a medical center in Jacksonville, Florida.
